weekly_top_story.headline: Thailand Launches Airstrikes on Cambodia, Reigniting Border Conflict and Killing Several
weekly_top_story.summary: Thailand's airstrikes on Cambodia have killed a Thai soldier and four civilians, breaching a U.S.-brokered ceasefire and risking a deeper regional crisis with thousands fleeing the border area.

stories.headline: Bondi Beach Shooting Leaves at Least 11 Dead in Apparent Terror Attack Targeting Jewish Community
stories.summary: A mass shooting at Sydney's Bondi Beach has killed at least 11 people, with witnesses describing chaos and a bystander hailed as a hero for tackling the gunman, heightening concerns over terrorism in Australia.

stories.headline: Australia Enacts Nationwide Ban on Social Media for Children Under 16
stories.summary: Australia's new law banning social media for under-16s will affect millions of teens, potentially reshaping youth digital habits and online safety amid global debates on tech regulation.
